name: Burning燃烧
content: The sacred fire shines out everywhere
The noble spirit runs far and wide
The olympic torch you and me
Burning burning burning the sacred fire
The sacred fire shines out everywhere
The noble spirit runs far and wide
The olympic torch you and me
Burning burning burning the sacred fire
The olympic torch you and me
Burning burning burning the sacred fire
The olympic torch you and me
Burning burning burning the sacred fire
The olympic torch you and me
Burning burning burning the sacred fire
